response.raw:
Here is my attempt at the task, wrapped in the specified output tags:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To support the development of training materials and technical manuals:

• Work with subject matter experts to gather information on processes, procedures, and technical details
• Organize content in a clear, logical flow that will be easy for users to follow and reference
• Use instructional design principles to chunk information, highlight key points, and incorporate visuals 
• Write content in plain language, avoiding jargon while still being technically accurate
• Develop exercises, examples, and knowledge checks to reinforce learning and understanding
• Conduct reviews with SMEs and end users to validate accuracy, completeness, and usability
• Maintain version control and make updates as needed to keep materials current
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
